title: Livestream alert: Ace the CSAI Math Entrance Test
description: Want to study computer science in Europe? Join the Computer Science and AI bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos – with exclusive JetBrains scholarships up for grabs! On December 18, 2024, at 5:00 pm UTC, we’re hosting a special preparation session to help you ace the entrance test for this BSc. You’ll get tips from […]
author: Alena Gupaisova
excerpt: On December 18, 2024, at 5:00 pm UTC, we're hosting a special preparation session to help you ace the entrance test for the Computer Science and AI bachelor's program at Neapolis University Pafos.
text: The place for learning and teaching computer science your way Livestream alert: Ace the CSAI Math Entrance Test Want to study computer science in Europe? Join the Computer Science and AI bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos – with exclusive JetBrains scholarships up for grabs! On December 18, 2024, at 5:00 pm UTC, we’re hosting a special preparation session to help you ace the entrance test for this BSc. You’ll get tips from Andrei Smolensky, Assistant Professor at Neapolis University Pafos. With a PhD in Algebra, he has been teaching for 10 years at universities and high schools. His current research is about interfaces between algebra and machine learning. Subscribe to JetBrains Academy updates Discover more
html:
The place for learning and teaching computer science your way

Livestream alert: Ace the CSAI Math Entrance Test

Want to study computer science in Europe? Join the Computer Science and AI bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos – with exclusive JetBrains scholarships up for grabs!

On December 18, 2024, at 5:00 pm UTC, we’re hosting a special preparation session to help you ace the entrance test for this BSc. You’ll get tips from Andrei Smolensky, Assistant Professor at Neapolis University Pafos. With a PhD in Algebra, he has been teaching for 10 years at universities and high schools. His current research is about interfaces between algebra and machine learning.

Subscribe to JetBrains Academy updates

Discover more
